listitem.para: WINHELP has two forms: with and without a keyword input. When no keyword is given, &PRODUCTNAME; will open the Windows help on filename to the table of contents. When a keyword is given, &PRODUCTNAME; will search the Windows help for the section on keyword within the given help file. You must enter the full keyword.

programlisting.userinput: ; Open winhelp file for notepad.exe WINHELP "c:\\windows\\help\\notepad.hlp
